name: Lhota Theories
description: Do you think conspiracy theories are the domain of the 21st century? We will disabuse you! The Czech village of Lhota is a place that has lived with its fictional stories since the days when people could not imagine the internet even in the craziest fantasies. Experience Lhota theories with its inhabitants and find out how scientifically unsubstantiated stories can affect people's daily lives. Even yours.
